EmailTemplate.name: 3PT - What Is Control?
EmailTemplate.subject: What Is Control? In Under 3 Minutes.
EmailTemplate.textOnly:
<http://www.vmturbo.com?utm_source=vmturbo&utm_medium=email&utm_campaign=header> What is Control? Gilt Group in New York Dear {{lead.First Name:default=Sir/Madam}}, Are you experiencing true control? Well, to answer that question we have to first understand what control is...and since words have never truly been our strong suit, we're going to let this video do the talking.
<http://vmturbo.com/blog/demand-driven-control?utm_source=vmturbo&utm_medium=email&utm_campaign=3pt_love&utm_content=whiteboard> Watch Now! <http://vmturbo.com/blog/demand-driven-control?utm_source=vmturbo&utm_medium=email&utm_campaign=3pt_love&utm_content=whiteboard> <http://www.vmturbo.com/downloads?utm_source=vmturbo&utm_medium=email&utm_campaign=3pt_love&utm_content=whiteboard> Downloads <http://www.vmturbo.com/resources/?utm_source=vmturbo&utm_medium=email&utm_campaign=3pt_love&utm_content=whiteboard> White Papers <https://greencircle.vmturbo.com?utm_source=vmturbo&utm_medium=email&utm_campaign=3pt_love&utm_content=whiteboard> Green Circle 500 Boylston Street, Eighth Floor, Boston, MA 02116 Tel: 866.634.5087
